The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 January is 2,747,085 (4,880.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 January, there were 354,552 new confirmed cases (629.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 December, there were 313,516 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (41,036 extra cases).
